about_the_game:
Blazing Hot High-speed Meteor Action in Chaotic Space!

METEORA is Inspired by the imagined Universes of classic space movies and science documentaries. Set billions of years ago, in an agitated, nascent universe; you are a meteor fighting for survival in a violently changing world.

Manoeuvre your way through asteroid belts, meteor barrages and other space events

Dodge, Chase & Plan Your Take-Downs

Death is a constant looming threat - watch the rear view markers and dodge the other meteors closing in behind you, while chasing the ones ahead and setting yourself up to take them down.

Create and Customize your own Meteor shower


Possess & create your own meteor shower to destroy your opponents all at once! Players can customize their meteor shower formation to maximise the damage and increase their chances of survival.

Unlock, upgrade, combine power-ups & Abilities to survive and conquer along your journey

Use various power-ups obtained by dashing into power-up elements out in space. Strategize your power-up pick-ups and combine them in real-time to get an edge over the opponents seeking to destroy you!.

Experience A Fraction of the Universe Each Level


Put your skills and instincts to test with harder difficulties and unlock hidden boss-challenges.

Brave a supermassive black hole, destroy a planet, save a sun and much more as you experience this catalytic universe.

Survive the Beginning of the Universe

short_description: BE A METEOR in a constant race for survival in a young and chaotic universe by dodging, chasing & taking down other meteors in METEORA. Power up, strategize and put your skills to the test in our spectacular arcade combat racer!
